title: UCI Reveals 2024 Licenses with Two New Women’s WorldTour Squads, YouTuber-Backed ProTeam
content:
There is some controversy over the women's Continental teams getting automatic invites to WorldTour races, including Tour de France Femmes.

Read the full article at UCI Reveals 2024 Licenses with Two New Women’s WorldTour Squads, YouTuber-Backed ProTeam on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
